english.segment1: Bitter thoughts test morals and encourage bitter action, pride comes before fall. think before you speak if you even speak at all, SPEAK AT ALL
english.segment2: I'll relinquish your heavy hearts of pain and sorry, healing sutures. an unguarded queen pursues, oblivious of her future
english.segment3: I don't, I don't expect anything, we are all hpeless, but i stay confident. with willingness to take control, we'll make our time well spent
english.segment4: let it sink in, every word that i said. LET IT SINK IN, let in sink in, every word that you heard me say
english.segment5: conquering anything and everything THROWN AT US. we will not be torn, our hearts will stand, they will stand as one (x2)
english.segment7: my victory in sight, a steady heart will not collide with misfortune, oh the integrity (x2)
